solution_line_template: The boys baked a total of {num_boys} x {muffins_per_boy} = <<{num_boys}*{muffins_per_boy}={boys_total_muffins}>>{boys_total_muffins} muffins.
The girls baked a total of {num_girls} x {muffins_per_girl} = <<{num_girls}*{muffins_per_girl}={girls_total_muffins}>>{girls_total_muffins} muffins.
Hence, there are a total of {boys_total_muffins} + {girls_total_muffins} = <<{boys_total_muffins}+{girls_total_muffins}={total_muffins}>>{total_muffins} muffins that will be for sale.
